title: Poster-Based Collaborative Learning for Comprehensive Pharmacy Exam Preparation

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary pharmaceutical knowledge and clinical pharmacy practice experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments, emphasizing team-based projects and peer feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically organize drug treatment strategies for major diseases through poster creation
Learners can improve their ability to develop drug treatment plans through peer evaluation and discussion
Learners can master over 80% of core concepts for comprehensive exams (NAPLEX-style) through poster-based learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
